So Sweet! Pria Ini Ajak 1.750 Anak-anak Veteran Gratis ke Disneyland
03 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Syanti Mustika


Ilustrasi Disneyland (Disneyland Orlando)

Orlando - Aktor Amerika Gary Sinise berkomitmen membantu keluarga tentara-tentara Amerika yang gugur. Salah satunya mengajak 1.750 anak-anak ke Disneyland, gratis!"Tak hanya aktor yang hebat, dia juga orang yang berhati baik", rata-rata itulah kalimat yang dikeluarkan orang-orang akan sosok Gary Sinise. Dia adalah aktor senior dari Amerika yang telah melalang diberagam film, sebut saja serial tv CSI:NY, Apollo 13, Fallen Angel, Criminal Mind Beyond Borders dan lainnya.Baru-baru ini Gary Sinise kembali membuat hati netizen tersentuh karena dia telah mengajak seribu lebih anak-anak tentara veteran bermain gratis di Disneyland.Dirangkum detikcom dari beragam sumber, Minggu (3/11/2019) sejak berperan sebagai Letnan Dan di Forest Jump, membuka mata Gary Sinise tentang dunia tentara. Dia pun bekerja keras membantu para veteran sebagai bentuk penghargaan dan penghormatannya kepada tentara.

[Gambas:Instagram]

Gary pun mendirikan yayasan bernama Gary Sinise Foundation. Yayasan ini bergerak membantu veteran, membela, dan yang bergerak pertama kali dalam mebantu veteran dan keluarganya. Salah satu program yayasan ini adalah 'Snowball Express' yang dimulai sejak tahun 2017. Adapun tujuannya adalah menghormati tentara AS yang gugur dengan membawa anak-anak mereka tur gratis ke tempat paling menyenangkan di dunia, Disneyland.Sampai saat ini telah lebih 1750 anak-anak ikut dalam program ini, dimana mereka diterbangkan ke Orlando dengan tur 5 malam secara gratis. Saat mereka datang beramai-ramai, tak lupa menyematkan pin 'we remember' untuk mengenang keluarga mereka yang gugur. Jika bagi sebagian prang program ini biasa saja, namun bagi anak-anak ini adalah suatu yang berarti. Dimana mereka tidak perlu merasa sendiri dan takut karena banyak tempat yang peduli dengan mereka. Serta mereka juga bisa membangun persahabatan dengan sesamanya.Tindakan Gary Sinise tidak hanya berhenti di sini saja. Dia pun juga menyuarakan kampanye untuk hak-hak yang menyangkut veteran. Dia juga sering menjadi sukarelawan datang ke barak-barak tentara dan membantu para tentara yang terluka dan cacat.Semoga tindakan Gary Sinise bisa memotivasi kita semua.Simak Video "Cerita Manis Katy Perry Dilamar Orlando Bloom di Helikopter"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sym/aff)

So Sweet! This Man Invites 1,750 Free Veterans to Disneyland
03 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Syanti Mustika


Illustration of Disneyland (Disneyland Orlando)

Orlando - American actor Gary Sinise is committed to helping the families of fallen American soldiers. One of them took 1,750 children to Disneyland, free! "Not only is a great actor, he is also a good-hearted person", on average that is the sentence people put out about the figure of Gary Sinise. He is a senior American actor who has played a variety of films, just call the CSI tv series: NY, Apollo 13, Fallen Angel, Criminal Mind Beyond Borders and others. Recently, Gary Sinise has again touched the hearts of netizens because he has invited a thousand more Veterans soldier children play for free at Disneyland. Summarized from various sources, Sunday (11/03/2019) since playing Lieutenant Dan in Forest Jump, Gary Sinise opened his eyes about the world of soldiers. He also worked hard to help veterans as a form of appreciation and respect for the army.

[Gambas: Instagram]

Gary also founded a foundation called the Gary Sinise Foundation. This foundation is engaged in helping veterans, defending, and moving for the first time in helping veterans and their families. One of the foundation's programs is 'Snowball Express' which began in 2017. The goal is to honor the fallen US soldiers by taking their children on a free tour to the most fun place in the world, Disneyland. Until now there are more than 1750 children participated in this program, where they were flown to Orlando with a 5 night tour for free. When they came together, they didn't forget to pin 'we remember' pins to commemorate their families who died. If for some people the program is normal, but for children this is something meaningful. Where they do not need to feel alone and afraid because many places care about them. And they can also build friendships with each other. Gary Sinise's actions don't just stop here. He also voiced a campaign for rights concerning veterans. He also often volunteered to come to the army barracks and help the wounded and disabled soldiers. Hopefully Gary Sinise's actions could motivate us all. Watch the Video "Katy Perry's Sweet Story Proposed by Orlando Bloom in the Helicopter" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (sym / aff)
